game.name: Unlucky Seven
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Unlucky Seven will take you on a space walk and tell you a story about love, hate, and craving for human flesh.
